definition: to fight/to combat/to seize/(of heart) to beat

sentences.english: Fuxinning Capsule is a safe and effective new drug of Chinese herbal medicine for VPC .
sentences.chinese: 复心宁胶囊是一种安全有效的治疗室性早搏中药新药。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the treatment of functional ventricular premature beats and report the result of long term follow up of it.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨功能性室性早搏的治疗及长期随访结果。

sentences.english: There are left ventricular bands in 28 hearts of 38 cases with premature ventricular contraction.
sentences.chinese: 在38例室性早搏受检者中，检出左心室条束28例。

sentences.english: Objective To conclude the curative effects of Wenxin granule on the coronary heart disease with frequent premature ventricular contractions.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨稳心颗粒治疗冠心病频发性室性早搏的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of tissue Doppler in position oriented diagnosis of VP.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨组织多普勒对室性早搏定位诊断的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence of extrasystoles on cardiac repolarization time.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究早搏对心室肌复极时间的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To observe and evaluate the effect of premature beats on cardiac function.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察和评价早搏对心功能的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effects of modified Roast Radix Glycyrrhizae Decoction on patients with premature ventricular complexes(PVCs).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察加味炙甘草汤治疗室性早搏的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between hypertensive left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH) and ventricular premature beat.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析高血压左心室肥厚与室性过早搏动的关系。

definition: atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
